The drunk stumbled by, oblivious to anyone addressing him. He crashes 
into a wall but rights himself, and stumbles further down the steps.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::::
> The run down bot knew he was being  followed, his scences were 
amzing.
> He was afterall the infamous Autobot Repugnas.  He was the unsung 
hero
> for he took the dirty jobs where no one else would and when he got
> back his attitude set people apart from him.  He stopped and turned.
> His infrared vision showing exactly where the bot stood.
> "No need to show your self" the ugly got said.  His pincers snapping 
s
